channel.title: Any ideas guys?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm currently using a Project Insanity blank source. I've reduced lag about as much as I can think. I just want your preferences on decreasing server load a lot more.
What I've currently done: - Competely recoded the NPC system and how it finds/loads NPC's - Took a lot of stuff outta process and made them in events "ModifiedCycleEventManager" - Fixed deadlocks - Recoded unnecessary loops - Etc.
This is currently what I'm at and i think it still sucks. [code][5/20/13 12:53 PM]: Average Cycle Time: 2ms [5/20/13 12:53 PM]: Players online: 1, engine load: 0.33%[/code]
Any ideas? Flame if you want. Any criticism will be good for me. So i know what I did good/bad.
- Thanks

item.title: Any ideas guys?
item.dc:creator: @m4x_pwng3 m4x pwng3
item.description:
@m4x_pwng3 wrote:

Hey guys,
I’m currently using a Project Insanity blank source. I’ve reduced lag about as much as I can think. I just want your preferences on decreasing server load a lot more.

What I’ve currently done:

  • Competely recoded the NPC system and how it finds/loads NPC’s
  • Took a lot of stuff outta process and made them in events “ModifiedCycleEventManager”
  • Fixed deadlocks
  • Recoded unnecessary loops
  • Etc.

This is currently what I’m at and i think it still sucks.

[5/20/13 12:53 PM]: Average Cycle Time: 2ms [5/20/13 12:53 PM]: Players online: 1, engine load: 0.33%

Any ideas? Flame if you want. Any criticism will be good for me. So i know what I did good/bad.

  • Thanks

Read full topic
